regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client,workers import re,xbmc,xbmcgui,requests def cleanup(s): return re.sub('&#(\d+);', '', s) u = '' u += client.request('https://www.naughtyblog.org') u += client.request('https://www.naughtyblog.org/page/2/') u += client.request('https://www.naughtyblog.org/page/3/') u += client.request('https://www.naughtyblog.org/page/4/') u += client.request('https://www.naughtyblog.org/page/5/') u += client.request('https://www.naughtyblog.org/page/6/') u += client.request('https://www.naughtyblog.org/page/7/') u += client.request('https://www.naughtyblog.org/page/8/') u += client.request('https://www.naughtyblog.org/page/9/') r = re.findall('(?s)id="post-index-content.*?href="([^"]*).*?src="([^"]*).*?title="([^"]*)', u) r = [(i[0],i[1], cleanup(i[2])) for i in r if 'SITERIP' not in i[2] if 'goo' not in i[2] if 'Leak' not in i[2] if 'Collection' not in i[2]] return r

<title>[makelist.param3]</title> <link>$doregex[playurl]</link> <thumbnail>[makelist.param2]</thumbnail>
#$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client,workers import re,xbmc,xbmcgui def unescape(s): return re.sub('&#(\d+);', '', s) class page: def run(self, r): threads = [] ; self.r = [] ; r = [(r.index(i)+1, i) for i in r] for i in r: threads.append(workers.Thread(self.request, i)) [i.start() for i in threads] ; [i.join() for i in threads] return ''.join([str(i[1]) for i in sorted(self.r, key=lambda x: x[0])]) def request(self, i): self.r += [(i[0], client.request(i[1]))]
url = 'https://motherless.com/videos/recent?page=' u = [] for i in range(1, 10): u += [url + str(i) + '='] u = page().run(u) r = re.findall('(?s)<div class="thumb-container video">.*?href="([^"]*).*?src.*?src="([^"]*).*?alt="([^"]*)', u) r = [(i[0],i[1],unescape(i[2])) for i in r] return r

#$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client,workers import re,xbmc,xbmcgui
def cleanup(s): return re.sub('&#(\d+);', '', s)
class page: def run(self, r): threads = [] ; self.r = [] ; r = [(r.index(i)+1, i) for i in r] for i in r: threads.append(workers.Thread(self.request, i)) [i.start() for i in threads] ; [i.join() for i in threads] return ''.join([str(i[1]) for i in sorted(self.r, key=lambda x: x[0])]) def request(self, i): self.r += [(i[0], client.request(i[1]))]
url = 'https://hidefporn.ws/page/' u = [] for i in range(1, 15): u += [url + str(i) + '/'] u = page().run(u) r = re.findall('(?s)h2 class="title">(?:[^=]*)="([^"]*)">([^<]*).+?img src="([^"]*)', u) r = [(i[0],cleanup(i[1]),'https://hidefporn.ws'+i[2]) for i in r] return r
playurl #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client import re r = re.findall('(?s)<a href="([^\/]*\/\/nitroflare[^"]*)', page_data)[0] return r
